entries.context: A natural language name identifying the structure definition. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.
A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the structure definition.
The name of the organization or individual responsible for the release and ongoing maintenance of the structure definition.
The name of an individual to contact.
Text that can be used to describe the constraint in messages identifying that the constraint has been violated.
